message: I propose a 90/10 split in my favor.  It's a fair starting point, and we can adjust from there.
I propose a 55/45 split in my favor.  It's a fairer split considering we'll both be losing money over time.  Let's reach an agreement before the value of our money drops further.
I'm willing to compromise.  Let's split it 60/40 in my favor.  I think this is a fair offer, considering the inflation and your previous proposal.
